title: Element perturbation experiment
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a element perturbation experiment.
comment: An element perturbation experiment is a special case of dataset. It includes assay metadata.

assay_term_name.title: Assay name
assay_term_name.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology term for the assay.

date_submitted.title: Date submitted
date_submitted.description: The date that the experiment received all required replicates and files
date_submitted.comment: Do not submit. date_submitted will be assigned only by DCC personnel.

dbxrefs.title: External resources
dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: An identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with ENCODE objects.

documents.description: Protocols or other documents that describe the assay or the results (not data files).

elements_references.title: Elements references
elements_references.description: Datasets that contain reference files listing the elements being characterized in this functional characterization experiment.

items.title: Reference
items.description: Dataset that contain reference file or annotation listing the elements being characterized in this functional characterization experiment.
items.comment: See reference.json or annotation.json for a list of available identifiers.

biosamples.title: Biosamples
biosamples.description: The biosamples used in the transgenic enhancer experiment.

items.title: Biosample
items.description: The unique test organism used in the transgenic enhancer experiment.
items.comment: See biosample.json for a list of available identifiers.

element_location.title: Element location
element_location.description: The genomic coordinates specifying the location of the tested element.

assembly.title: Mapping assembly
assembly.description: The genome assembly to which coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38.

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the chromosome, e.g. chr1 or chrX

genes.title: Gene
genes.description: The genes whose expression is under investigation in the perturbed element experiment.

items.title: Gene
items.description: The gene whose expression is under investigation in the perturbed element experiment.

genotyping_primer_pairs.title: Genotyping primer pairs
genotyping_primer_pairs.description: The pair(s) of primers used to confirm deletion of the perturbed element.

items.title: Genotyping primer pair
items.description: The pair of primers used to confirm deletion of the perturbed element.

forward_genotyping_primer.title: Forward genotyping primer
forward_genotyping_primer.description: The sequence of the forward genotyping primer.

reverse_genotyping_primer.title: Reverse genotyping primer
reverse_genotyping_primer.description: The sequence of the reverse genotyping primer.

gene_expression_primer_pairs.title: Gene expression primer pairs
gene_expression_primer_pairs.description: The pair(s) of primers used to measure expression of the gene under investigation.

items.title: Gene expression primer pair
items.description: The pair of primers used to measure expression of the gene under investigation.

gene.title: Gene
gene.description: The target gene of the primer pair.

forward_gene_expression_primer.title: Forward gene expression primer
forward_gene_expression_primer.description: The sequence of the forward gene expression primer.

reverse_gene_expression_primer.title: Reverse genotyping primer
reverse_gene_expression_primer.description: The sequence of the reverse gene expression primer.

relative_gene_expression_values.title: Relative gene expression values
relative_gene_expression_values.description: The average relative gene expression values of the perturbed biological replicates compared to the control.

items.title: Relative gene expression value
items.description: The average relative gene expression value of the perturbed biological replicates compared to the control.

relative_gene_expression_value.title: Relative expression value
relative_gene_expression_value.description: The average relative gene expression value of the perturbed biological replicates compared to the control.

supersedes.title: Supersedes
supersedes.description: The element perturbation experiment(s) that this element perturbation experiment supersedes by virtue of being newer, better etc. than the one(s) it supersedes.

items.comment: See element_perturbation_experiment.json for a list of available identifiers.
